flexpy.XMLTagMap module¶

A script containing functions which make it possible to show the dependencies among the different element types in the FLEx data.

flexpy.XMLTagMap.add_element_to_dependency_dict(el, dependency_dict, by_guid)¶
flexpy.XMLTagMap.create_dependency_dict_from_multiple_roots(roots, by_guid)¶
flexpy.XMLTagMap.create_dependency_dict_from_single_root(root, by_guid)¶
flexpy.XMLTagMap.create_tag_class_definition(el, dependency_dict)¶

Used to generate the files in flexpy.tags.

flexpy.XMLTagMap.create_tag_class_file(el, dependency_dict)¶

Used to generate the files in flexpy.tags.

flexpy.XMLTagMap.create_tag_class_files(tag_dict)¶

Used to generate the files in flexpy.tags.

flexpy.XMLTagMap.get_all_children_recursive(el)¶
flexpy.XMLTagMap.get_tag_key_from_element(el, by_guid)¶

Used to get the tag_key (which is used to find elements in a TagDict) for a given element.

Parameters

  • el (xml.etree.ElementTree.Element) –

  • by_guid (dict) – the dictionary of elements by their guid, used to find tags of parents of this element

flexpy.XMLTagMap.print_dependency_dict(d)¶
